document_data.name: Thorm Ubler
document_data.mainbody: '''Thorm Ubler''' was a miserly man who profited heavily from owning the only mill in all of [[Mistledale]]. He had two sons, [[Heldo Ubler|Heldo]] and [[Parvus Ubler|Parvus]].
